text: Hi and diagnosed dysthymia year ago but going therapy since kid multiple reasons mainly because father physically and verbally violent towards mom and later me mom let us say difficult also last five years moving dad and mom multiple reasons and since graduated highschool four years ago also breakup around time lost contact friends and extremely difficult stay jobs or classes social life reduced family made life long depression worst and worst till point breakdown around August last year made me suicidal first time much better right specially thanks current therapist issue right although definitely better not intrusive thoughts and start feel bad cope not anedonia and quite enjoy listening music and watching movies example fear moving want social get back work get back college go gym genuine desire but kind big and paralizing fear not quite understood but realised biggest breakdowns afterwards moments starting feel better or really happy last year high school extremely happy but graduation gf broke me and Isolated friends great depression episode not fully recovered till day lot bad stuff happened covid happened but year ago diagnosed and started meds started get better got good job outside family bussiness making friends but one day woke and felt extremely burned felt bad quit job and family situation made things worst point became suicidal and took lot pills around six months ago and feel waaaay better but scared moving couple months made plans get enrolled college or courses start exercising apply jobs but not feel right not feel bad exactly made current state confort zone and scared leaving weeks trying understand makes me feel way but yerterday therapy and realised scared starting feel good taking new stuff because fear relapse and scared suicidal feel like not control mind dominated horrific intrusive thoughts enormous and paralyzing fear moving Thanks you read point would like know you think and you know situations like
